roundConfig.eventModeWarning: **WARNING**: This game mode is unranked! Learn more about game modes on my support server.
roundConfig.whatMode: What mode do you want to play? {{modes}}
roundConfig.expiredMatch: The game has expired, please start another match.
roundConfig.noManageMessagesPermission: I am without the permission of {{MANAGE_MESSAGES}}. Without it I can't continue! Please give me the permission and try again.
roundConfig.invalidMode: This does not seem like a valid mode. Canceling..
roundConfig.whatRounds: What is the number of rounds of the match?
roundConfig.isNaN: That doesn't look like a number! Canceling...
roundConfig.roundsLimit: You can only start up to 10 rounds! Canceling...
roundConfig.whatDuration: What's each round time duration? (Minimum: 20 seconds)
roundConfig.minimiumTime: The minimum time is 20 seconds! Please enter a higher or equal value. Canceling...
roundConfig.invalidDuration: This does not seem to be a valid duration. Canceling...
roundConfig.whatAnimeListWebsite: What website is your animelist on? (Supported: {{websites}})
roundConfig.invalidWebsite: This does not appear to be a supported website. Canceling...
roundConfig.whatUsername: What is your username on your chosen website?
roundConfig.invalidUsername: I didn't find this username on the website you chose! Canceling...
roundConfig.whatYearAndSeason: What is the year and season? (Example: 2020, Winter)
roundConfig.noAnimeFound: I couldn't find any anime in the specified year or season.
roundConfig.invalidFormat: This does not seem to be in the right format.

start.rollingMatch: There is already a match running on a voice channel on that server.
start.tip: **TIP**: If you want to stop the match configuration, send **{{prefix}}stop**

botinfo.ritsuAbout: Hi! I am **Ritsu** and I am a bot based on the game **Anime Music Quiz** made with {{jsEmoji}} **Javascript** using discord.js, I will play an opening or ending and you must guess from what anime is from! I am on {{servers}} servers,  i'm online since **{{days}}d {{hours}}h {{minutes}}m {{seconds}}s** and with **{{matches}}**current matches right now!

creditsDescriptions.themes: For providing the themes for the bot to play
creditsDescriptions.animemusicquiz: Of course, the biggest inspiration for this project
creditsDescriptions.kyuuchan: Many parts of the code I was inspired by it
creditsDescriptions.creators: Ideas, development and a lot of patience, without these 3 people the bot probably wouldn't exist.

help.howtoplay: **How to Play**: When using the command to start the game, the bot will play a song from a random opening or ending (or if you specified a specific gamemode) and whoever can guess the anime from the largest number of openings or endings according to the rounds , wins.

invite.inviteMessage:
**You can add me to your server using this link {{inviteUrl}}**

Want to stay on top of new updates and chat with the developers? Join to my support server! Just take a look at **{{prefix}}botinfo** ^w^

prefix.noPrefix: You need to specify the prefix.
prefix.changedPrefix: The server prefix has been changed: {{newPrefix}}

lang.success: My language is now marked as: **{{lang}}**

bio.changedBio: Your profile bio has been updated.
bio.noBio: You have not added a new biography.

leaderboard.embedAuthor: Top 10 users with the higher level.

anime.helpDescription: Search for a anime from MyaAnimeList.
anime.noAnimeSpecified: You need to specify which anime you want to search for.
anime.gettingAnime: Getting the data from this anime...
anime.noAnime: No anime was found under that name.
